title: URGENT HELP!!!!
content:

comments.body:
any help would be much appreciated.

You are by default enrolled for all courses' ESA. You only need to take an action if you want to withdraw/drop. 

Also how did you forget? That app used to send a reminder every single day, even after you enroll.

Tell them u did it and you even got a confirmation message.It is actually buggy - even when u register it asks u to register again and again.so tell them u did it from ur side and udk what happened after that
By default you are enrolled. You should have got the admit card/hall ticket by now. Make sure you don't miss taking it.
how? every time u login itll b there (when its open), but mainly its for withdraw/drop.
